entry.string: The Blocks Module controls the configuration, display position and grouping of each "block" on your website. The Blocks module is a core module within Xaraya, and cannot be removed.
entry.translation: Zee Blucks Mudoole-a cuntruls zee cunffeegooreshun, deespley puseeshun und gruoopeeng ooff iech "bluck" oon yuoor vebseete-a. Zee Blucks mudoole-a is a cure-a mudoole-a veethin Xereya, und cunnut be-a remufed. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: From the menu, you have four choices.
entry.translation: Frum zee menoo, yuoo hefe-a fuoor chueeces. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: View Instances -- View the current instances that are actively in use by your Xaraya System.
entry.translation: Feeoo Instunces -- Feeoo zee coorrent instunces thet ere-a ecteefely in use-a by yuoor Xereya System.

entry.string: Add instance -- Add a new block instance to be displayed on your site.
entry.translation: Edd instunce-a -- Edd a noo bluck instunce-a tu be-a deespleyed oon yuoor seete-a.

entry.string: Add Group -- Add a new block group for template positioning.
entry.translation: Edd Gruoop -- Edd a noo bluck gruoop fur templete-a puseeshuning.

entry.string: Register Block -- Register a block that was not included in a module's installation.
entry.translation: Regeester Bluck -- Regeester a bluck thet ves nut inclooded in a mudoole's instelleshun.

entry.string: The Blocks Module has no blocks included at this time.
entry.translation: Zee Blucks Mudoole-a hes nu blucks inclooded et thees teeme-a.

entry.string: The Blocks Module has no hooks included at this time.
entry.translation: Zee Blucks Mudoole-a hes nu huuks inclooded et thees teeme-a.

entry.string: Extended information about this module can be found here. [modules module]
entry.translation: Extended inffurmeshun ebuoot thees mudoole-a cun be-a fuoond here-a. [mudooles mudoole-a]
